Outputs

result_time: 03:30
timezone_details: The time difference between UTC and America/Los_Angeles is -7 hours (during DST). The original time 10:30 UTC on 2024-03-15 converts to 03:30 PDT (Pacific Daylight Time) on the same day. America/Los_Angeles is currently observing Daylight Saving Time (DST).
